text: The Miracle is a 1991 Irish British drama movie directed by Neil Jordan and starring Beverly D'Angelo, Donal McCann, Lorraine Pilkington, Niall Byrne, Cathleen Delany, Tom Hickey. It was distributed by Miramax. ==Other websites== * * Category:1991 drama movies Category:Irish drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:Movies directed by Neil Jordan Category:Movies set in Ireland
title: The Miracle (1991 movie)
